title: What is Bootstrap?

options.a: A popular front-end framework for building responsive web pages

options.a: Designing web pages that respond to user input
options.b: Designing web pages that adapt to different screen sizes and devices
options.c: Designing web pages with high-speed performance
options.d: Designing web pages with colorful graphics
